Title: Exploring iOS 17's Mood Tracking Feature: A Game Changer
Author: jennologist
Published Date: 2023-11-02T00:52:57.000Z
URL: https://www.lemon8-app.com/@jennologist/7296659477552890373?region=us
Text: Something that I was super excited for was iOS 17’s mood tracking feature in the health app! I love mood tracking apps so I was excited to see what Apple’s own version would be like. And I am so happy to say I love it!

Each day you can set what you feel at the moment, and how you felt overall. This is a feature that a lot of mood tracking apps don’t have, I love the ability to say how you felt overall, especially for how much my mood changes throughout the day…

The graphics of the mood each day is so pretty, and I love seeing the patterns throughout the days. Seeing the moods graphically makes it really easy to see patterns.

It also puts your mood next to other heath tracking features so you can see how much each thing affects your mood!

I would love if it had its own widget to

Title: iOS 17 turns your phone into a mood-tracking device — here's how the feature works
Author: Philip Michaels
Published Date: 2023-08-25T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://www.tomsguide.com/how-to/how-to-log-your-mood-in-the-health-app-on-your-iphone
Text: [Skip to main content](https://www.tomsguide.com/how-to/how-to-log-your-mood-in-the-health-app-on-your-iphone#main)

## Recommended reading

(Image credit: Future)

When [iOS 17](https://www.tomsguide.com/news/ios-17) launches this fall, it adds a new mental health-focused feature with the ability to log your mood in the built-in Health app. With a record of your emotional state, Apple's thinking goes, you'll be more aware of the factors that contribute to your mood, which makes you better informed on dealing with life's ups-and-downs.

Since I've [installed the iOS 17 public beta](https://www.tomsguide.com/how-to/how-to-install-the-ios-17-public-beta), I've been trying out this new part of the Health app. And while it's not a substitu

Title: How to use the new mental health features in iOS 17
Author: 
Published Date: 2023-08-25T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://appleinsider.com/inside/ios-17/tips/how-to-use-the-new-mental-health-logging-in-ios-17
Text: Apple has introduced a new mental health assessment and logging option in [iOS 17](https://appleinsider.com/inside/ios-17), which encourages you to simply record how you are feeling, or look deeper into general anxiety and other issues. Here's how to use both.

It seemed as if the biggest health news announced at [WWDC](https://appleinsider.com/inside/wwdc) 2023 was to do with size — the Health app is at last now available on the [iPad](https://appleinsider.com/inside/ipad). But on both that [iPadOS 17](https://appleinsider.com/inside/ipados-17) version and the [iPhone](https://appleinsider.com/inside/iphone)'s iOS 17, two significant new mental health features have been added.

One is a Mental Health Assessment questionnaire which, although Apple stresses is only for info

Title: Apple provides powerful insights into new areas of health
Published Date: 2023-06-01T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2023/06/apple-provides-powerful-insights-into-new-areas-of-health/
Text: Apple provides powerful insights into new areas of health - Apple
opens in new window
PRESS RELEASEJune 5, 2023
# Apple provides powerful insights into new areas of health
iOS 17, iPadOS 17, and watchOS 10 introduce mental health and vision health features, and the Health app arrives on iPad
* * * * ![iPad Pro shows a summary in the Health app, iPhone 14 Pro shows Time in Daylight, and Apple Watch Series 8 shows the emotion Pleasant.](https://www.apple.com/newsroom/images/2023/06/apple-provides-powerful-insights-into-new-areas-of-health/article/Apple-WWDC23-health-insights-hero-230605_big.jpg.large.jpg)
New health features in iOS 17, iPadOS 17, and watchOS 10 expand into two impactful areas and provide innovative tools and experiences across platforms.
